<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Improvised Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=2250) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Exploration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=66" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 52</row>

**Archetype** [Swordmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=33)

**Prerequisites**
[Swordmaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1139); Expert in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

You've learned to repair your equipment even in challenging circumstances, making use of what you have available. You can attempt to [Repair](/Actions.aspx?ID=42) an item without a [repair kit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=43), instead improvising tools out of your gear or found items. This adds 5 minutes to the time it takes to Repair the item. You can also Repair an item while on the move without needing a stable surface. This adds 10 minutes to the times it takes to Repair the item.
name: Improvised Crafting
